article_title: SEC Censures Firm Over Barnes & Noble Acquisition Offer
article_text:
The Securities and Exchange Commission said Thursday it had settled charges against private investment firm G Asset Management LLC, which was accused of inflating the value of Barnes & Noble Inc. shares with a false offer to acquire the chain.

The SEC said that the firm, headed by Michael Glickstein, issued a misleading news release on Feb....
